plot: Having been dragged in for questioning after an altercation with his girlfriend, Sebastian Kelly soon finds that more is riding on his answers than he ever could have imagined.
title: The Order of Things
plot_es: Having been dragged in for questioning after an altercation with his girlfriend, Sebastian Kelly soon finds that more is riding on his answers than he ever could have imagined.
plot_en: Having been dragged in for questioning after an altercation with his girlfriend, Sebastian Kelly soon finds that more is riding on his answers than he ever could have imagined.
